name: Grilled Avocados
author: kcin.malo
summary: Had some ripe avocados left over. They were extras from guacamole the previous weekend. So I gave this quick and extremely easy recipe a shot on the grill, and the wife and kids loved it. Fresh ones are good too. Use paprika instead of the chipotle and chili powder for less spicy. Canola oil can be substituted for olive oil if desired.
ingredients: ¼ cup olive oil, or as needed
1 pinch ground chipotle pepper, or more to taste
1 pinch chili powder, or more to taste
directions: Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Whisk olive oil, ground chipotle pepper, and chili powder together in a bowl; brush over the entire surface of the cut-side of each avocado
Grill avocados, cut-side down, on the preheated grill until grill-lines begin to form on the avocado flesh, about 5 minutes
